metadata.title: CVE-2009-4402 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The default configuration of SQL-Ledger 2.8.24 allows remote attackers toperform unspecified administrative operations by providing an arbitrarypassword to the admin interface.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
